member.name: ITfFnBalloon.UpdateBalloon
member.summary: Changes the style and text of a language bar balloon item.
member.param: Contains one of the values that specifies the new balloon style.
Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the new text for the balloon.
Contains the number of characters of the new text in pch.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfFnBalloon interface is implemented by a text service and is used by an application or other text service to update the balloon item that the text service adds to the language bar.
An application or text service obtains an instance of this interface by calling with the class identifier of the text service and then calling with GUID_NULL and IID_ITfFnBalloon.
